item.description:
Join us for a Special Business Plan Hot Seat featuring VINTAGE BLUE Apparel

ABOUT THE COMPANY
Vintage Blue is a hot and new vintage-inspired apparel company with tremendous market potential. Headed by its passionate founder, Liza Goncalves, Vintage Blue designs are tailored for the trend-setting woman whose main interests and passions are sports, music, and fashion. Vintage Blue has acquired licenses from professional sports organizations that inspire their design team to complete a line of fashionable sportswear for women.

ABOUT THIS HOT SEAT:
The business plan hot seat is an opportunity for entrepreneurs to present their business plan to fellow entrepreneurs, service professionals, and investors for the purpose of receiving critical feedback, analysis, and support. CEOs present their plan and get constructive criticism so that they can prepare to raise capital to finance their businesses. Attendees are encouraged to participate in the critique. In this special hot-seat, Exemplar CEO Christopher Marston will lead the critique to provide maximum value to the company.


NOTE FROM THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER: VINTAGE BLUE
Hello Entrepreneurs and Investors,
Vintage Blue is the best of then and now- the fusion
of old and new. It hasn't been my side job or my
full-time job for the past five years- it's been my life.
I am Vintage Blue.
After years in the entertainment industry, hosting
my own show, and deconstructing men?s jerseys for
celebrity clientele, I?m launching my line ?Vintage
Blue.? I acquired the license to the All-American
Girls Professional Baseball League featured in the
movie ?A League of Their Own.? The line is vintage
inspired with an innovative twist to women?s sports
apparel.
To believe in yourself, and that you can do
something- anything, is the number one quality I
believe is necessary to start your own business.
However, believing in yourself is not the only thing
you need to be successful in your business. You have
to have drive, ambition, skills- and most importantly,
a love and vision for your company.
We have made major inroads at Macy?s and
ADIDAS, and a deal is close to being on the
table. We almost have every piece in place to make
this work on a grand scale, and because of all the
developments over the past few months, I?ve never
been more enthusiastic, encouraged, and
optimistic. It?s been a struggle; I acknowledge the
stepping-stones along the way, and know that it
has made us poised for success.
I invite you to come to learn more about this
opportunity to become a part of a company
formed by creative, motivated, and driven
individuals. We are seeking financial investment
to further design, develop, manufacture,
distribute, and market our brand and collections.
I look forward to meeting you.
Sincerely,
Liza Goncavles
item.name: Business Plan Hot Seat: Vintage Blue Apparel
